member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.CommandLineUtils.ArgumentEscaper
member.summary: A utility for escaping arguments for new processes.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.CommandLineUtils.ArgumentEscaper.EscapeAndConcatenate(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Undo the processing which took place to create string[] args in Main, so that the next process will receive the same string[] args.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.CommandLineUtils.DotNetMuxer
member.summary: Utilities for finding the "dotnet.exe" file from the currently running .NET Core application

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.CommandLineUtils.DotNetMuxer.MuxerPath
member.summary: The full filepath to the .NET Core muxer.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.CommandLineUtils.DotNetMuxer.MuxerPathOrDefault
member.summary: Finds the full filepath to the .NET Core muxer, or returns a string containing the default name of the .NET Core muxer ('dotnet').
member.returns: The path or a string named 'dotnet'.
